mapper.select: SELECT EmpId FROM EmpBas (NOLOCK) WHERE EmpId = #{empId} AND outDate IS NULL

SELECT SystemId, PaperNo, FlowId, SerialNo, SteptType, SteptCode, SteptNote, IsConfirm, comment, ConfirmDate, ConfirmEmpId, Announce, IsEmail2Agent, IsEmail2EndUser, SteptKind FROM FLO_PaperRoute (NOLOCK) WHERE PaperNo = #{paperNo}

SELECT ConfirmProcedure=ISNULL(t1.SPName_Confirm, ''), NonConfirmProcedure=ISNULL(t1.SPName_NonConfirm, '') FROM FLO_StdRoute t1 (NOLOCK), FLO_PaperRoute t2 (NOLOCK) WHERE t2.PaperNo = #{paperNo} AND t1.SystemId = t2.SystemId AND t1.FlowId = t2.FlowId AND t2.SerialNo = #{serialNo} AND t1.SerialNo = t2.Eo_SerialNo
